snippet: Tommy Lynn Sells, 49, who claimed to have killed as many as 70 people, was put to death Thursday after the Supreme Court rejected his lawyers’ demand that Texas release information about where it gets its lethal injection drug.
abstract: Tommy Lynn Sells, man who claimed to have killed as many as 70 people, is executed in Texas after Supreme Court rejects his lawyers’ demand that state release information about where it gets its lethal injection drug.
lead_paragraph: Tommy Lynn Sells, 49, who claimed to have killed as many as 70 people, was put to death Thursday after the Supreme Court rejected his lawyers’ demand that Texas release information about where it gets its lethal injection drug.

headline.main: Texas: Serial Killer Executed With New Dose of Drug
headline.print_headline: Texas: Serial Killer Executed With New Dose of Drug
